| History                 = The Siren Sect is an all female group of [[Vampires|vampires]] led by [[Alyssa (Siren Sect) (Earth-616)|Alyssa]]. These use their skills of seduction to entice men and other vampires to do their bidding. They are one of the many vampire sects to attend the century meeting held by the Lord of the Vampires [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Dracula]]. The sect is led by Alyssa, who was one of the most skilled and ruthless of the group.  Alyssa was romantically involved with [[Xarus (Earth-616)|Xarus]], the son of [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Dracula]]. She allied herself with Xarus against Dracula, and helped him in his attempt to kill him.{{r|Death of Dracula #1}}

The Siren Sect possesses and empathic and hypnotic abilities far beyond any other vampire. The enables them to seduce almost any creature and influence their moods and physiological responses.{{Citation}}
| Equipment               = Alyssa possesses an pendant containing a device which bends certain frequencies of light around her, letting her stand in broad daylight without being burned.
